mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (user_email, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_sex, user_address, user_career, user_age, user_final_education, user_language, user_skills, user_image, user_status, sns_type, sns_id, job_id) values (#{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userSex}, #{userAddress}, #{userCareer}, #{userAge}, #{userFinalEducation}, #{userLanguage}, #{userSkills}, #{userImage}, #{userStatus}, #{snsType}, #{snsId}, #{jobId})
